name: Brave
description: Unafraid in the face of danger. Slightly boosts strength and reduces fear penalties.

name: Clever
description: Quick thinking and a sharp mind. Increases intelligence, but dislikes brute force.

name: Lazy
description: Avoids hard work, prefers rest. Reduces endurance but boosts creativity.

name: Paranoid
description: Constantly suspicious. Increases perception but reduces charisma.

name: Charismatic
description: Naturally charming. Improves relationships and persuasion.

name: Stoic
description: Rarely shows emotion. Boosts endurance but hurts empathy.

name: Empath
description: Deeply in tune with the emotions of others. Boosts empathy, reduces logic.

name: Strong
description: Powerful build. Increases strength, but slightly lowers flexibility.

name: Reckless
description: Acts without thinking. Increases strength and speed, but reduces luck and perception.

name: Mysterious
description: Shrouded in secrecy. Slight boost to charisma and intelligence.
